participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Practical and nurturing, with a strong connection to nature.
participant_1.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Reflective and calm, with a deep appreciation for mindfulness and inner peace.
participant_2.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i like meditation. i live in alaska. i am a buddhist.
